But if you are trying to play killer i would not recommend unless you have enough patience to deal with how the survivors be acting. Hopefully VHS will be better than this not going to lie.

After over 500 hours on Dead by Daylight, I have decided to write a short but complete review on what I think of this game, and to start it off, I think this game killed itself.
Back in September of 2020, I had so much fun playing this game, after being convinced to play it I picked it up on sale and bought the new killer to have some fun, and after a few days of game after game, I fell in love for what would be a game I played every hour of the day for months. This was only up until late last year. On December of 2020 I fell torn apart from the game, being super excited for new killers was something I always loved, but I noticed that I wasn't having fun like before.
Don't get me wrong, playing survivor with friends is a blast, and truly a great experience for some casual rage and fun, which comes as the same for the killer. Depending on how you play the killer, or even the game, playing as the killer can be a bunch of fun. These killers include: The Blight, Demogorgan, The Oni, The Deathslinger, Pinhead, or even The Trickster can be super fun to play as. But a majority of killers in this game are a complete mess and super hard to use.
This game was meant to be horror, a taste of a 4V1 PVP, but instead we were given a mess of what would turn into toxicity, camping, tunneling, and huge abuse of character abilities that become horribly painful and boring.
One game you're playing against Freddy Kruger (one of the most annoying killers), and the next game you go against a tunneling Leatherface (one shot down ability). This makes the game boring, a game that isn't worth your time.
Without the support of Devs and no fixes or balancing, this game becomes unfair and annoying to play.
It's rinse and repeat of toxic player after toxic player becomes something that doesn't help side with the fact that the game becomes so boring.
I tried to come back, have some fun with a game I used to love.
But all I got in return was 2 games of fun, and the rest being boring repetitive gameplay.
If you insist, try this game out, give it a try, but in the end, this game will never be what it used to be.

- 3/10 -

Esse jogo é a coisa mais bugada que já foi feita pelo homem, os caras só se importam com lançar skin e killer a cada dois meses e estão se lixando com a comunidade, desbalanceado e cheio de choro, principalmente de quem joga de killer. Mas ainda gosto do jogo, mesmo ele sendo ruim.

Do you hate yourself? You will after playing this... don't waste your time or money, and trust me, you will be wasting a lot of it. A very toxic and hateful community player base, incompetent developers and game breaking bugs with every update and patch have run this game straight into the dirt. Save yourself the burden and despair.

Задумка игры шикарная, много разного контента, интересный геймплей, НО есть одно "но", которое делает эту игру абсолютно неиграбельной. Заключается оно в отсутствии разделения команды выживших на "соло" и с "друзьями", как это в любых других играх. Хочешь играть с друзьями в дискорде? Окей, должен быть командный режим, а тут выходит, что игра прекрасна до тех пор, пока тебе в игре за Убийцу не попадется фул команда "друзьяшек", координирующих свои действия на 100% по дискорду, что по сути является чем-то между "стримснайпингом" и "павергеймингом", когда победить их всех одному убийцы просто невозможно физически. Нет, возможно если ты играешь за Тир1 (в игре есть негласное разделение убийц по силе) за какую-нибудь Ямаоки, которая всю карту пролетает за 2 секунды и от неё невозможно уйти, но это выходит, что нужно играть за нескольких подобных Убийц, а остальных ПОЛНОСТЬЮ игнорировать, даже если тебе нравятся их механики и ты умеешь ими пользоваться, то против "друзьяшек" у тебя 0 шансов. 

Поэтому дизлайк за отсутствие одиночного режима, когда ВСЕ играют по одиночке, а не только ты будучи Убийцей, а остальные тупо зашли в четыре рыла тебя потроллить.
Schlechtestes Spiel überhaupt. Selbst nach Rund 700 Stunden kein einiger Spielspaß vorhanden. Keine 5€ wert.
